name: SYNC (tempest, fundamentalphantom)
description:
Guide the lonely half note Minim through a world of music by syncing in time with rhythmic obstacles.

SYNC was developed by people for the Intro Division of Cornell Game Design Initiative.

Credits:

  • Programmers
    • Stephanie Chan
    • Jeffrey Huang
    • David Landy (Programming Lead)
  • Artists

    • Jiaming Zhang (Design Lead)

  • Auxiliary
